name: vikunja
description: Vikunja is a self-hosted, open-source to-do and project management platform. It offers lists, kanban boards, sharing, and reminders, with mobile apps, a web client, and an API.

features.title: Task Lists
features.description: Organize tasks into lists and projects for structured task management

features.title: Kanban Boards
features.description: Visualize workflow with kanban boards and drag-and-drop task movement

features.title: Due Dates
features.description: Set deadlines for tasks with calendar views and overdue highlighting

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications for upcoming tasks and deadlines via email or push

features.title: Subtasks
features.description: Break down complex tasks into subtasks with nested checklists

features.title: Labels And Priorities
features.description: Categorize and prioritize tasks with custom labels and priority levels

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share lists with team members and assign tasks to collaborators

features.title: Attachments
features.description: Add files and documents to tasks for complete context and reference
